name: searchPrincipalsV1
description: Search for principals based on the specified parameters.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return.

offset.description: Starting offset of the results to return.

sort_by.description: Attribute by which to sort. Default is "name".

sort_order.description: Sort order. Default order is ascending.

auth_domain_id.description: ID of the authentication domain that contains the principal.

organization_id.description: ID of the organization of which the principal is a member.

is_assigned_roles_or_is_local.description: A Boolean that specifies whether the principal has any roles assigned or is a local user. When a principal is a local user, or when the principal has any roles assigned, this value is 'true'.

role_id.description: ID of a role assigned to the principal.

is_totp_enabled.description: Indicates if the principal has TOTP authentication enabled. Returns the users with TOTP authentication enabled when the value is true.
